title: OURTHING SPECIAL EDITION with Sammy "The Bull" Gravano and former CIA spy
description:
This episode is a special edition with guest co-host former CIA spy Brandon Blackburn for a sneak peek of Brandon’s upcoming series Mob Bless America. On this episode Sammy talks with Brandon about how the mafia and the US Federal Government at times worked together when it was of mutual benefit to both sides.

I’d love to thank my sponsors Raycon, Policy genius and DAVE!!
